Title: Glances: Arbitrary Code Execution
Synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in Glances which may lead to arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: Glances is an open-source system cross-platform monitoring tool. It allows real-time monitoring of various aspects of your system such as CPU, memory, disk, network usage etc.

Description.Text: A vulnerability in XML parsing may lead to a variety of XML attacks.

Impact.Text: A vulnerability in XML parsing may lead to a variety of XML attacks.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Glances users should upgrade to the latest version:
